IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO ORGANIZE ALL WORKERS FOR THEIR MORAL, ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL ADVANCEMENT.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO ORGANIZE ALL WORKERS FOR THEIR MORAL, ECONOMIC AND SOCIAL ADVANCEMENT.
IRS990.Desc: THE OFFICERS AND BUSINESS REPRESENTATIVE OF THE COUNCIL COLLECETIVELY BARGAIN WITH EMPLOYERS ON BEHALF OF THE COUNCIL'S AFFILIATED LOCALS AND MEMBERSHIP.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MANAGEMENT IS REQUIRED TO EVALUATE TAX POSITIONS TAKEN BY THE COUNCIL AND RECOGNIZE A TAX LIABILITY IF THE COUNCIL HAS TAKEN AN UNCERTAIN POSITION THAT, MORE LIKELY THAN NOT, WOULD NOT BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE U.S. FEDERAL, STATE, OR LOCAL TAXING AUTHORITIES. THE COUNCIL IS SUBJECT TO ROUTINE AUDITS BY TAXING JURISDICTIONS; HOWEVER, THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO AUDITS FOR ANY TAX PERIODS IN PROGRESS. TYPICALLY, TAX YEARS WILL REMAIN OPEN FOR THREE YEARS; HOWEVER, THIS MAY DIFFER DEPENDING UPON THE CIRCUMSTANCES OF THE COUNCIL.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: EDWARD J MALLOY INITIATIVE FOR CONSTRUCTIVE SKILLS INC
PAINTERS AND ALLIED TRADES FOR CHILDRENS HOPE FOUNDATION
HEALING EMERGENCY AID RESPONSE TEAM- 9 11 INC

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IUPAT DC 9 IS A MEMBERSHIP ORGANIZATION AS DISCUSSED IN ARTICLE XVI OF THEIR BY-LAWS. MEMBERS ARE DUES PAYING INDIVIDUALS WORKING IN COVERED EMPLOYMENT UNDER COLLECTIVE BARGAINING AGREEMENTS NEGOTIATED BY THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ACTIVE MEMBERS HAVE FULL VOTING RIGHTS AND VOTE IN THE ELECTION OF ITS OFFICERS. NOMINATIONS AND ELECTION OF OFFICERS IS DESCRIBED IN ARTICLES IX THROUGH XIV OF ITS BY-LAWS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PER SECTION 194 OF THE INNTERNATIONAL CONSTITUTION, THE MEMBERSHIP VOTES ON CONTRACT RATIFICATIONS AND ANY CHANGES TO THE ORGANIZATION CONSTITUTION AND BY-LAWS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OFFICERS AND TRUSTEES WERE NOTIFIED THAT A COPY OF THE FORM 990 WAS AVAILABLE FOR REVIEW AT THE ORGANIZATION PRIOR TO ITS FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH EMPLOYEE ANNUALLY SIGNS A STATEMENT WHICH AFFIRMS THAT SUCH PERSON: A) HAS RECEIVED A COPY OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY; B) HAS READ AND UNDERSTANDS THE POLICY; C) HAS AGREED TO COMPLY WITH THE POLICY AND UNDERSTANDS THAT THE ORGANIZATION IS A TAX EXEMPT ORGANIZATION AND THAT IN ORDER TO MAINTAIN THEIR FEDERAL TAX EXEMPTION, THEY MUST ENGAGE PRIMARILY IN ACTIVITIES WHICH ACCOMPLISH ONE OR MORE OF THEIR TAX EXEMPT PURPOSES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: NO DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC.
IUPAT DISTRICT COUNCIL NO. 9'S FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE PREPARED USING THE MODIFIED CASH BASIS OF ACCOUNTING.
THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING BODY IS RESPONSIBLE FOR OVERSIGHT OF THE FINANCIAL STATEMENT AUDIT AND SLECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT AUDITOR PERFORMING THE AUDIT.
